summary: This document is a custodian declaration certifying the authenticity of business records provided in response to a grand jury subpoena dated August 16, 2019, signed by AUSA Maurene Comey. Attached is a credit profile from Experian Inc. for an individual, showing financial accounts and inquiries up to August 2019.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Signed the grand jury subpoena dated August 16, 2019, requesting specified business records.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued and signed by Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey, requesting specified business records.

events.title: Custodian Declaration Executed
events.description: A custodian of records executed a declaration certifying the authenticity of business records provided in response to the grand jury subpoena.

locations: 701 EXPERIAN PARKWAY, PO BOX 2002, ALLEN, TX 75013
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued on August 16, 2019, signed by AUSA Maurene Comey, as part of an investigation.
A custodian of records certified the authenticity of business records provided in response to the subpoena under penalty of perjury.
An Experian credit report dated August 26, 2019, is included, showing financial activity for an individual from November 2016 to September 2017.
The credit report lists accounts with major financial institutions including Citibank, American Express, JPMorgan Chase, and Wells Fargo Bank.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the Southern District of New York (SDNY) case materials.
